content:
courtesy of DW

President Donald Trump with Supreme Court Nominee Amy Coney Barrett PERIOD

Julia Butch
Staff WriterSeptember  

While the death of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg prompted widespread support and memorialization it also spawned a new political battle PERIOD
Democrats have vowed to block a preelection nomination PERIOD However President Trump has already made his pick. president Trumps Supreme Court nominee Judge Amy Coney Barrett is a judge on the seventh U.S PERIOD Circuit Court of Appeals in Chicago and is a favorite among social conservatives PERIOD
A stark contrast to Ginsburg Barrett has a record of opposing progressive policies PERIOD She has a clear antiabortion rights judicial record Kate Smith of CBS News said PERIOD During her three years on the seventh Circuit Court of Appeals she has already ruled on two abortionrelated cases both times favoring restrictions on access to abortion. whereas President Trump has referred to Barrett as one of our nations most brilliant and gifted legal minds and a woman of unparalleled achievement Biden has described Barrett as having a written track record of disagreeing with the U.S PERIOD Supreme Courts decision upholding the Affordable Care Act. democrats are firing back led by Biden who said The Senate shouldnt act until after the American people select their next president and the next Congress. vice Presidential candidate Kamala Harris tweeted This selection would move the court further right for a generation  harm millions of Americans. the real question is What does this mean for the election
Elaine Kamarck Senior Fellow at Brookings thinks this will have either very little impact or none at all. on September  Biden was . points ahead of Trump only a . difference from the February  polls where he ran ahead of Trump by . on the other hand Michael Sean Winters from National Catholic Reporter believes that Ginsburgs death will take the light off of COVID19 therefore helping President Trump PERIOD
The most obvious reason the court vacancy helps Trump is that the country is talking about something other than COVID19 Winters said PERIOD
